// Pivot 0, 0
int pinball[16] = {
	221, 560,
	291, 592,
	295, 599,
	292, 605,
	285, 606,
	210, 585,
	206, 574,
	211, 563
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float pinball[16] = {
	0.315714f, 0.861538f,
	0.415714f, 0.910769f,
	0.421429f, 0.921538f,
